meanings.definition: A dentist specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of diseases affecting the gums and supporting structures of the teeth.
meanings.sent1: The periodontist helped me keep my gums healthy.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the periodontist next week.
meanings.sent3: The periodontist joked that my gums were on vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in treating gum diseases made her the periodontist to go to.
meanings.sent5: The periodontist's expertise in gum care was truly impressive.
